WorkItem.Description:
I´ve tried several builds for lock with b4 and found several issues
 
Talents
Moltencore is missing from the demonology tree.
Backlash and Pyroclasm have changed position in 3.1, also backlash needs 2 points in intensity and pyroclasm has 3 talent points instead of 2.
Demonic pact gives no dps increase even when no spellpower buffs are enabled, neither do Death´s embrace, Pandemic, or Improved Life tap, (Dps from Imp LT should be minimal but still not non- existant, specially in the longer fights)
 
Glyphs
Glyph of Corruption only gives a dps increase if Nightfall is enabled.
Glyph of Felguard and glyph of Chaosbolt do not increase Dps.
 
I can´t find any way to indicate the use of of Drain Soul instead of Shadow Bolt when under 25% or Soulfire when decimation procs. It´s probably not implemented yet.
 
There doesn´t seem to be a way to indicate wich should be the backdraft sequence.
 
When trying out full afliction y noticed that unstable afliction and immolate conflict with eachother. When both apear in the casting sequence the last one isn´t taken into acount (adding their glyphs doesn´t add the dps they add when the other spell isn´t enabled and removing the second spell does not result in any change in Dps.)
 
Under options, in the pet tab, there is a posibility to use a doomguard the last minute in the fight, this should say use the Infernal.
 
I´m aware that pets aren´t fully implemented yet, but for a more accurate calculation (specially for demonology builds) there should be a posibility to enable physical dps buffs and debuffs for them.
 
Despite these issues the sheet looks great ^^, thank you for your hard work.

Comments.Message:
Molten Core is fixed in the next version.
The rest I'm partially aware of, other things are new for me.
I'll look into it tomorrow and will post a longer reply then.

K, now a complete list:
Molten Core: fixed in next build
Backlash / Pyroclasm: fixed in next build
Demonic Pact: work in progress
Death's Embrace: nothing that only works under a certain % has been implemented
Pandemic: fixed in next build
Imp Life Tap: work in progress
Glyph of Corr: fixed in next build
Glyph of Felguard: was active by default, fixed in next build
Drain Soul / Soulfire: nothing that only works under a certain % has been implemented
Backdraft: work in progress
UA / Immo: they can't be up on the same target in 3.1, so this is working as intended
Doomguard option: work in progess, doesn't do anything atm
Pet buffs: Pets don't benefit from any buffs yet, only those that boost them via the Warlock stats, work in progress

Thanks for your feedback! I'm looking forward to your testing of the next build :)

Demonic Pact: fixed in next build
Imp Life Tap: I've changed the calcs a bit but taking Imp LT can actually lower your DPS because of the 4T7 and Glyph of LT

Still open:
Death's Embrace: nothing that only works under a certain % has been implemented
Drain Soul / Soulfire: nothing that only works under a certain % has been implemented
Backdraft: work in progress
Doomguard option: work in progess, doesn't do anything atm, changed to Infernal in next build though
Pet buffs: Pets don't benefit from any buffs yet, only those that boost them via the Warlock stats, work in progress
